hooks.command: PANE_TTY=$(/opt/homebrew/bin/tmux display-message -t $TMUX_PANE -p '#{pane_tty}') ; DIR_NAME=$(basename "$PWD") ; ESC=$(kitten notify --only-print-escape-code "Claude Code ($DIR_NAME)" "Waiting for approval") ; printf '\ePtmux;%s\e\\' "$(echo "$ESC" | sed 's/\x1b/\x1b\x1b/g')" > $PANE_TTY ; printf '\a' > $PANE_TTY
